Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Our [A]mouths were open graves, full of [F#m7]broken vows we [D]made Our [B]hearts ran wild, our tongues could not be [E]tamed
Verse 2: What [A]darkness had concealed{,} Your [F#m7]law has now re[D]vealed Our [B]guilt was great, our bitter fate was [E]sealed
Chorus 1: Our [F#m]only hope, our [D/F#]only hope is [A]You, [E/G#]Lord Our [F#m]only hope, our [D/F#]only hope is [A]You
Verse 3: Though [A]hypocrites and fools, You [F#m7]draw us to the [D]truth For [B]Your own glory{,} You make all things [E]new
Chorus 2: Our [F#m]only hope, our [D/F#]only hope is [A]You, [E/G#]Lord Our [F#m]only hope, our [D/F#]only hope is [A]You, [E]Lord
Bridge: The [A/C#]bridges we had burned{,} You have rest[D]ored You [F#m]gave us hope{,} when there was none bef[E]ore You [A/C#]paid the debt that we could not aff[D]ord And [F#m]cast away our guilt foreverm[E]ore
Verse 4: So, [A]when our days are through our [F#m7]hope will rest in [D]You For [B]we can trust Your promises are [E]true
Chorus 3: Our [F#m]only hope is [D/F#]You, our [A]only hope is [E/G#]You (2x) Our [F#m]only hope, our [D/F#]only hope is [A]You, [E/G#]Lord (2x) Our [F#m]only hope, our [D]only hope is [A]You
